rpg-beta:
⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️ **WARNING** ⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️

**RPG IS IN BETA!!**
This version of the RPG is in Testing, so be aware of the values can change drastically and frequently. Also be aware that your RPG account will (probably) be deleted with the release of the final version (due to balances, I need to check if XP is being distributed correctly, etc.).

**BUT CALM DOWN!!** You won't be trying for anything either! At the end of the BETA, all beta testers will receive an exclusive BADGE on their Profile, and **FOR TESTERS WHO SEND A FEEDBACK OR BUG ON THE SUPPORT SERVER** a unique Skill that no one else will be able to have at the end of the BETA!

I ask all testers to send feedback on the support server (available in the command `/status menhera` [by clicking on the title]), report bugs too, remembering that the sooner the bugs are fixed, the sooner the final version will come out. That's it, hope you enjoy this RPG
